channel.title: Rag on Arrans github.io
channel.description: Recent content in Rag on Arrans github.io

item.title: Mintplex-Labs/anything-llm
item.description: The all-in-one Desktop & Docker AI application with built-in RAG, AI agents, No-code agent builder, MCP compatibility, and more.

item.title: Shubhamsaboo/awesome-llm-apps
item.description: Collection of awesome LLM apps with AI Agents and RAG using OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini and opensource models.

item.title: eosphoros-ai/DB-GPT
item.description: AI Native Data App Development framework with AWEL(Agentic Workflow Expression Language) and Agents

item.title: infiniflow/ragflow
item.description: RAGFlow is a leading open-source Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) engine that fuses cutting-edge RAG with Agent capabilities to create a superior context layer for LLMs

item.title: milvus-io/milvus
item.description: Milvus is a high-performance, cloud-native vector database built for scalable vector ANN search

item.title: khoj-ai/khoj
item.description: Your AI second brain. Self-hostable. Get answers from the web or your docs. Build custom agents, schedule automations, do deep research. Turn any online or local LLM into your personal, autonomous AI (gpt, claude, gemini, llama, qwen, mistral). Get started - free.

item.title: sigoden/aichat
item.description: All-in-one LLM CLI tool featuring Shell Assistant, Chat-REPL, RAG, AI Tools & Agents, with access to OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, Ollama, Groq, and more.

item.title: lobehub/lobe-chat
item.description: ðŸ¤¯ LobeHub - an open-source, modern design AI Agent Workspace. Supports multiple AI providers, Knowledge Base (file upload / RAG ), one click install MCP Marketplace and Artifacts / Thinking. One-click FREE deployment of your private AI Agent application.

item.title: onyx-dot-app/onyx
item.description: Open Source AI Platform - AI Chat with advanced features that works with every LLM

item.title: run-llama/llama_index
item.description: LlamaIndex is the leading framework for building LLM-powered agents over your data.

item.title: Cinnamon/kotaemon
item.description: An open-source RAG-based tool for chatting with your documents.
